_comment: SLA Policy Configuration - Based on CISA BOD 22-01 and industry standards
description: Vulnerability remediation SLA aligned with CISA Binding Operational Directive 22-01

sla_definitions._comment: SLA in days - KEV status takes priority over CVSS severity

kev_post_2021.description: KEV vulnerabilities with CVE assigned 2021 or later
kev_post_2021.reference: BOD 22-01: Two weeks for vulnerabilities added after Nov 2021

kev_pre_2021.description: KEV vulnerabilities with CVE assigned before 2021
kev_pre_2021.reference: BOD 22-01: Six months for vulnerabilities assigned before 2021

critical.reference: Industry standard: Critical vulnerabilities within 15 days

high.reference: PCI-DSS / Industry standard: High vulnerabilities within 30 days

medium.reference: Industry standard: Medium vulnerabilities within 90 days

low.reference: Industry standard: Low vulnerabilities within 180 days

priority_order._comment: Priority ranking - lower number = higher priority

status_thresholds._comment: Percentage of SLA remaining to trigger status change

overdue_actions._comment: Recommended actions when SLA is breached
overdue_actions.isolate_recommendation: If remediation cannot be accomplished, remove asset from network per CISA guidance
